cmdlets.name: and
cmdlets.description: Return true if **all of** the given values are truthy.
cmdlets.result: return true when every value is truthy
cmdlets.category_description: Comparison helpers, eg. or, and, equal, not equal, less than, greater than etc.

parameters.name: values
parameters.description: list of values (via *splat) to be checked via AND condition

cmdlets.name: or
cmdlets.description: Return true if any value is truthy.
cmdlets.result: return true when first value is truthy
cmdlets.category_description: Comparison helpers, eg. or, and, equal, not equal, less than, greater than etc.

parameters.name: values
parameters.description: list of values (via *splat) to be checked via AND condition
